snippet.title: Atomic Heart - Official Gameplay Trailer #1 - Meet Vovchik
snippet.description:
❗⚠️ Please, add Atomic Heart to Steam wishlist: this will help us a lot! ⚠️❗
https://store.steampowered.com/app/668580/Atomic_Heart/

Our first gameplay demo from early stages of developement. Level of graphics detailes is much higher now, but we're still stick to the main concept!
👇👇👇

Atomic Heart is a first-person adventure shooter with a rich storyline and deep gameplay mechanics, set in futuristic Soviet dystopia. Master innovative combat mechanics, explore rich world, fight robots and scavenge for resources as you play as P-3, KGB agent who was sent to find terrorists, who sabotaged secret science Facility 3826. The game will be released on PS4, PS5, Xbox and PC when it's done.

❗⚠️ Please, add game to Steam wishlist: this will help us a lot! ⚠️❗
https://store.steampowered.com/app/668580/Atomic_Heart/

Join our Discord server to stay tuned!
https://discord.com/invite/AtomicHeart

Learn more:

⚡https://MUNDFISH.COM - CHECK OUT NEW UPDATED SITE WITH a ❗LOT❗ of New content!
https://twitter.com/mundfish](https://twitter.com/mundfish - Stay tuned with our Twitter!
https://www.facebook.com/AtomicHeartOfficial/
https://www.instagram.com/atomicheart_official
https://vk.com/mundfish
